column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We began with the Breakfast in Bed shot
column2: the smooth bourbon you could taste the hint of maple syrup
column3: in house cured bacon chased with orange juice- simply can't start brunch without this! Of course what would brunch be without mimosas?! It's fun to have the fruit juices on the side
column4: like enjoying a new mimosa each time!
